about_the_game:
This bundle will add two new areas to the game: a Nights of Azure 2 tribute area "Nightless Ruined City" and the "Lotus Blossom Pond" area.

- Painting World "Nightless Ruined Town"
A town swallowed in darkness and full of eerie shadows. The enemies that can be found in this area are unique to the world of this painting, and by defeating the boss in its depths the players will be able to receive some if the "Nights of Azure 2" related equipment items.

- Outskirts Area "Lotus Blossom Pond"
A beautiful area with a pond surrounded by blossoming trees. Matching to its beauty, it is also abundant with lovely materials carrying various unusual effects and traits.

*This content unlocks after the final chapter of the game.
*This content is also included into "Atelier Lydie & Suelle Season Pass."
